Package breakthroughPP.players

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPlayer
    A player class that implements methods of the PLayer interface that all players have in common.
    AdvancedPlayer
    Class that represents the a player with reasonable artificial intelligence
    AIPlayer
    Implementation of an very intelligent player.
    InterActivePlayer
    Implementation of an interactive player playing the game breakthroughPP
    NetPlayer
    The NetPlayer class works as a wrapper class to be able to store any Player as well as to contain the funcions required for accessing a remote player on another computer in the net.
    PlayerFactory
    Factory that creates players based on their types
    Probabilities
    This class provides a double[][] matrix containing a value for each field on the board.
    Prometheus
    Calculate the firt depth of move of a token
    RandomPlayer
    Class that represents the a player with "artificial intelligence" (chooses any of the valid moves randomly)
    SectionProbabilities
    Class storing the probabilities of having certain neighbours
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractPlayer.State
    Possible states for the turn cycle state machine of every player.
    PlayerType
    Enumeration containing all the different players
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PlayerException
    Used in the package breakthourghPP.player.
    WrongCycleException
    Used in the package breakthourghPP.player, when a wrong player-method is used.
